description: Curated manifest of verified SKSE plugins for Skyrim Sentinel

plugins.name: Address Library for SKSE Plugins
plugins.author: meh321
plugins.description: Compatibility layer enabling SKSE plugins to work across game versions

plugins.name: SSE Engine Fixes
plugins.author: aers
plugins.description: Fixes various engine bugs and issues in Skyrim SE

plugins.name: SkyUI
plugins.author: SkyUI Team
plugins.description: Elegant, PC-friendly interface with MCM support

plugins.name: powerofthree's Tweaks
plugins.author: powerofthree
plugins.description: Collection of engine-level fixes and improvements

plugins.name: powerofthree's Papyrus Extender
plugins.author: powerofthree
plugins.description: Extends Papyrus scripting with new functions

plugins.name: Bug Fixes SSE
plugins.author: meh321
plugins.description: Fixes for various game bugs not addressed by engine fixes

plugins.name: ConsoleUtilSSE
plugins.author: Ryan
plugins.description: Extended console functionality for modders

plugins.name: More Informative Console
plugins.author: Linthar
plugins.description: Enhanced console with detailed object information

plugins.name: MCM Helper
plugins.author: Parapets
plugins.description: Simplifies Mod Configuration Menu creation

plugins.name: Scaleform Translation++
plugins.author: Ryan
plugins.description: Translation framework for Scaleform-based mods

plugins.name: ENB Helper SE
plugins.author: aers
plugins.description: Enables advanced ENB features and weather detection

plugins.name: Dynamic Animation Replacer
plugins.author: Felisky
plugins.description: Condition-based animation replacement framework

plugins.name: RaceMenu
plugins.author: Expired
plugins.description: Extended character customization interface

plugins.name: Scrambled Bugs
plugins.author: KernalsEgg
plugins.description: Additional engine bug fixes

plugins.name: Actor Limit Fix
plugins.author: meh321
plugins.description: Prevents crashes from actor count limits

plugins.name: Better Jumping SE
plugins.author: meh321
plugins.description: Enables jumping while sprinting and directional jumping

plugins.name: JContainers SE
plugins.author: silvericed
plugins.description: JSON-based data storage for Papyrus scripts

plugins.name: Fuz Ro D-oh
plugins.author: shadeMe
plugins.description: Enables lip-sync for unvoiced dialogue

plugins.name: Spell Perk Item Distributor
plugins.author: powerofthree
plugins.description: Distributes spells, perks, and items to NPCs dynamically

plugins.name: Improved Camera SE
plugins.author: ArranzCNL
plugins.description: True first-person body and improved camera control

plugins.name: moreHUD SE
plugins.author: Ahzaab
plugins.description: Additional HUD elements for item and enemy info

plugins.name: TrueHUD
plugins.author: Ersh
plugins.description: Modern health bars and target info framework

plugins.name: Keyword Item Distributor
plugins.author: powerofthree
plugins.description: Distributes keywords to items dynamically

plugins.name: Base Object Swapper
plugins.author: powerofthree
plugins.description: Swaps base objects dynamically at runtime

plugins.name: Backported Extended ESL Support
plugins.author: Nukem
plugins.description: Enables extended ESL record limits on older game versions
